Title: Story of Your Life
Author: Ted Chiang
Description: A science fiction short story collection by Ted Chiang, including the famous 'Story of Your Life,' which was the basis for the movie Arrival.

Author: George Orwell
Description: A dystopian social science fiction novel by George Orwell, depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

Title: The Moon and Sixpence
Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Description: A novel by W. Somerset Maugham inspired by the life of the painter Paul Gauguin, following a protagonist who leaves his comfortable life to pursue his passion for painting.

Title: Stray Birds
Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Description: A collection of poems by Rabindranath Tagore that explores the beauty of nature, love, and the human spirit.
